nodes.text: Frederik Budolph-Larsen (born December 4, 1975) is an animator and director who worked on LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles and LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. He directed the 2016 Freemaker Adventures episodes "Race on Tatooine" and "Showdown on Hoth". Budolph-Larsen also worked on other projects including the Hitman computer games Blood Money, Contracts, and Hitman 2: Silent Assassin and Lego Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu.
